title: The Legend of Sleepy Hollow
creator_credit: Sam Weiss, David Adams, Nick Bosustow and Pyramid Films
brief_description: Visualizes the spectral spirits and twilight superstitions that haunted the drowsy Dutch settlement of Sleepy Hollow. Concerns the rivalry between Ichabod Crane and Brom Bones for the hand of Katrina Van Tassel, and how the Headless Horseman of Sleepy Hollow removes Ichabod from the scene. Screenplay by Joseph Cavella, based on the story by Washington Irving. Narrated by John Carradine.
